title: Billie Eilish - Lost Cause (Official Music Video)
author: BillieEilishVEVO
description:
Listen to “Lost Cause”, out now: https://BillieEilish.lnk.to/LostCause
Pre-order the new album “Happier Than Ever”, out July 30: https://billieeilish.lnk.to/HappierThanEver

Directed by Billie Eilish

Special thanks to Ashley Nickole, Joya Jackson, Kerrice Brooks, Lexee Smith, Nataly Santiago, Yuliana Maldonado
